title: Apply for a University Scholarship
description: A student wants to apply for a scholarship managed by the university's financial aid office.

tasks.description: Guide the student to the university's scholarship portal.
Help the student use the portal's filters to find scholarships for which they might be eligible (e.g., by major, GPA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assists the student in narrowing down the list of potential scholarships.

tasks.description: Explain the application requirements for a specific scholarship, such as an essay or letters of recommendation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the application checklist.
